column5: Does anyone know of a fishfinder that has down imaging and side imaging with just one transducer?  It looks like the Humminbird 899 and 999 models have just the one, but it's not clear.  Thanks
Any of the HB units that have SI/DI have a single transducer.  Here's the transducer I use on my 898 HD SI.  Down imaging/Side imaging all in one.
I have the Bird 798 SI/DI - 1 transducer.  I love the side image when I'm trolling.  I see fish off to the side of the boat, move over 15' or so - Wham! - Fish on!
